name: Classic-Fit Mesh Polo Shirt
description: Ralph Lauren debuted his original polo shirt in 1972, and today the iconic style is offered in a wide array of colors and fits. This short-sleeve version is made from breathable cotton mesh and cut for a roomy silhouette. What’s more, the tennis tail helps keep the shirt in place when tucked in, and our signature embroidered pony gives it a classic touch.

name: Custom Slim Interlock Polo
description: An American style standard since 1972, the Polo shirt has been imitated but never matched. Over the decades, Ralph Lauren has reimagined his signature style in a wide array of colors and fits, yet all retain the quality and attention to detail of the iconic original. This floral-print version is made from luxe cotton interlock with an ultrasoft finish.

name: Custom Slim Fit Interlock Polo
description: An American style standard since 1972, the Polo shirt has been imitated but never matched. Over the decades, Ralph Lauren has reimagined his signature style in a wide array of colors and fits, yet all retain the quality and attention to detail of the iconic original. This trim version is made from luxe cotton interlock with an ultrasoft finish.

name: Custom Slim Long-Sleeve Polo
description: An American style standard since 1972, the Polo shirt has been imitated but never matched. Over the decades, Ralph Lauren has reimagined his signature style in a wide array of colors and fits, yet all retain the quality and attention to detail of the iconic original. This long-sleeve version is made from luxe cotton interlock with an ultrasoft finish.

name: Custom Slim Fit Big Pony Mesh Polo
description: An American style standard since 1972, the Polo shirt has been imitated but never matched. Over the decades, Ralph Lauren has reimagined his signature style in a wide array of colors and fits, yet all retain the quality and attention to detail of the iconic original. This version features an embroidered “3,” the number typically worn by a polo team’s strongest player.

Over the decades, Ralph Lauren has reimagined his signature style in a wide array of colors and fits, yet all retain the quality and attention to detail of the iconic original. This striped version is made from our highly breathable cotton mesh, which offers a textured look and a soft feel.

This striped version is made from our highly breathable cotton mesh, which offers a textured look and a soft feel.

description: The athletic socks in this three-pack are designed with arch support and breathable mesh panels for comfort. Emblazoned at the cuffs with “Polo,” “USA,” and our signature Pony, these quarter crew socks are finished with contrast tipping at the heels and toes and sporty stripes.

name: Cotton-Blend Liner Sock 3-Pack
description: These socks are designed with silicone grippers at the heel, ensuring they will stay in place for all-day comfort. Their liner silhouette allows for a no-show appearance when worn with loafers or sneakers.

name: Slim Fit Stretch Polo Shirt
description: From its meticulous construction to its cotton mesh fabric, which only gets better with wear, Ralph Lauren’s Polo shirt has been an icon of American style since 1972. This version is crafted with a hint of stretch, which offers both a slim silhouette and unparalleled ease of movement.

name: Classic Fit Mesh Polo Shirt
description: An American style standard since 1972, the Polo shirt has been imitated but never matched. Over the decades, Ralph Lauren has reimagined his signature style in a wide array of colors and fits, yet all retain the quality and attention to detail of the iconic original. This mesh version is cut generously through the body and washed for added softness.

Over the decades, Ralph Lauren has reimagined his signature style in a wide array of colors and fits, yet all retain the quality and attention to detail of the iconic original. This long-sleeve version is cut trim through the body and washed for added softness.

name: Slim Fit Stretch Mesh Polo
description: An American style standard since 1972, the Polo shirt has been imitated but never matched. Over the decades, Ralph Lauren has reimagined his signature style in a wide array of colors and fits, yet all retain the quality and attention to detail of the iconic original. This version includes a hint of stretch, allowing for a comfortable fit and unparalleled ease of movement.

Over the decades, Ralph Lauren has reimagined his signature style in a wide array of colors and fits, yet all retain the quality and attention to detail of the iconic original. This trim version is made from our highly breathable cotton mesh, which offers a textured look and a soft feel.

name: Custom Slim Fit Mesh Polo
description: An American style standard since 1972, the Polo shirt has been imitated but never matched. Over the decades, Ralph Lauren has reimagined his signature style in a wide array of colors and fits, yet all retain the quality and attention to detail of the iconic original. This trim version is made from our highly breathable cotton mesh, which offers a textured look and a soft feel.

name: Custom Slim Soft Cotton Polo
description: An American style standard since 1972, the Polo shirt has been imitated but never matched. Over the decades, Ralph Lauren has reimagined his signature style in a wide array of colors and fits, yet all retain the quality and attention to detail of the iconic original. This trim version is made from luxe cotton interlock with an ultrasoft finish.

description: An American style standard since 1972, the Polo shirt has been imitated but never matched. Over the decades, Ralph Lauren has reimagined his signature style in a wide array of colors and fits, yet all retain the quality and attention to detail of the iconic original. This striped version is made from our highly breathable cotton mesh, which offers a textured look and a soft feel.

name: Slim Fit Polo Shirt

This version is made with a hint of stretch, allowing for a slim fit, while a special wash gives it a timeworn look from day one.

name: Custom Slim Fit Mesh Polo
description: An American style standard since 1972, the Polo shirt has been imitated but never matched. Over the decades, Ralph Lauren has reimagined his signature style in a wide array of colors and fits, yet all retain the quality and attention to detail of the iconic original. This trim version is made from our highly breathable cotton mesh, which offers a textured look and a soft feel.

This trim version is made from our highly breathable cotton mesh, which offers a textured look and a soft feel.
